content: hüj tüb by natasha sills to create a cowl just like mine to calculate for other sizes/gauges materials about 100 grams of yarn is plenty 1 ball of gritty knits super slink choose a needle much larger than recommended substitute 800-900 yards of any laceweight yarn fingering weight at least a us 10 1/2 6 5mm us 8 5mm circular needle sport weight at least a us 11 8mm worsted weight at least a us 13 9mm approximate gauge 6 sts per inch cast on formula gauge x circumference = cast on approximate tube size 24 circumference gauge ____ sts per inch 36 length desired circumference ____ inches the pattern cast on 140 sts and join in the round make sure your cast on is very loose knit until you run out of yarn bind off loosely note because the fabric is so stretchy due to the large needle calculating gauge on a fabric like this is tricky a yank in either size your bind-off needs to be loose very loose insanely loose direction will affect the length and width dramatically these looser than you ve ever bound off anything before measurements are just a general guide to what the size will be if you block the garment under no gauge and lay flat to measure bind off the first few stitches and pause to give your fabric a tug if the bind off doesn t stretch as much as the fabric below it you might want to tink back a round and try this < 36 > last round k1 yo repeat to end of round bind off 24 because there are twice as many stitches to bind off you ll need to allow a lot of extra yardage for the bind off round
